text: Keisuke to eichi to yogen-sha to shite no tenbun o arra kara itadaita hitori no ningendearinagara,-go ni natte hitobito ni mukai,`anata gata wa arra no soto ni, watashi o suhai shi nasai.' To wa ienai. Mushiro `anata gata wa,-nushi no chujitsu nashi mo be to nari nasai. Anata gata wa keiten o oshie rarete iru nodearu. Sore o seijitsu ni manabi nasai.' To (iubekidearu)
